thread.title: There’s A Meme That Turns "Jersey Shore" Scenes Into Movies And It's Hilarious
thread.title_full: There’s A Meme That Turns "Jersey Shore" Scenes Into Movies And It's Hilarious

author: Sam Stryker
title: There’s A Meme That Turns "Jersey Shore" Scenes Into Movies And It's Hilarious
text:
View this image ›
MTV ID: 10259024 2. Even though the show has been off the air since 2012, it’s recently found new life as a meme on Twitter where users label pictures of Snooki, JWoww, and the other cast members with appropriate movie titles. View this image ›
MTV ID: 10259030 3. It may sound totally bizarre, but it strangely works with HILARIOUS results. Need proof? Let’s take a journey to Seaside Heights! View this image ›
MTV ID: 10259038 4. There’s Saw : Saw (2004)
— 4MBUH (@4mbuh) ID: 10259283 5. Pirates of the Caribbean: Curse of the Black Pearl : Pirates of the Caribbean: Curse Of The Black Pearl (2003)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259414 6. Cast Away : Cast Away (2000)
— monty (@caramelthot) ID: 10259289 7. Taken : Taken(2009)
— fbg mike (@trapyeezus) ID: 10259456 8. Up : UP (2009)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259473 9. Gone Girl : Gone Girl (2014)
— daniele (@dcagiunta) ID: 10259298 10. Titanic : Kate Winslet poses nude for a sketch in Titanic (1997)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259419 11. Saving Private Ryan : Saving Private Ryan (1998)
— ANGELS KNOCK (@sounderemployed) ID: 10259316 12. Paul Blart: Mall Cop : Mall Cop (2009)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259423 13. Justin Bieber: Never Say Never : Justin Bieber: Never Say Never (2011)
— Isabelle (@_isabellygomez) ID: 10259321 14. The Sandlot : The Sandlot (1993)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259425 15. Blue Is the Warmest Color : Blue Is the Warmest Color (2013)
— Lias✨ (@damnlias) ID: 10259430 16. The Notebook : The Notebook (2004)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259427 17. Rocky: Rocky (1976) An amateur boxer from Philadelphia gets a shot at fighting for the heavyweight championship
— fran (@cooIcatz) ID: 10259440 18. Tron: Legacy : TRON Legacy (2010)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259448 19. Holes : Holes (2003)
— Lil Clothes Folder (@JakeyThomas) ID: 10259435 20. Ratatouille : Ratatouille (2007)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259481 21. The Fast and the Furious : Fast And Furious 6 (2013)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259499 22. And finally, Black Swan: Black Swan (2010)
— WILL (@sinamonnroII) ID: 10259508 23. And if none of these movies are going to be made, can we at LEAST get a proper Jersey Shore reunion? That’s all! View this image ›
MTV ID: 10259522
